entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 12:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
